projects:
[{'title': 'Work processes of service for maintenance vehicles', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'In the final work, "Work processes of service for maintenance vehicles" both, theoretical
knowledge and practical experience, have been applied. Work involves a complex workflow of
service that is mostly seen as a purely technical process. It was also the initial thesis. Basic principle of operation of the service is exposed on the example of the work-order from the
view of the service advisers. It is proved that for a successful business technical knowledge and
skills are not enough but also it is necessary an application of knowledge in management,
organization and quality control.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Toni', 'last_name': 'B.', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Operations Manager at Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center Maastricht - Warranty Claim Assessment Overseas PC/VAN'}]}, {'title': 'Analysis and  improvement suggestions for service processes', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'description': '• Situation analysis 
• SWOT analysis 
• Proposed solutions for work processes
• Proposed solutions for service application
• Proposed solutions for time keeping management and statistics
